thread.title: Ground News - 14 dead in a shipwreck in the south of Gran Canaria while other immigrants wait to be helped
thread.title_full: Ground News - 14 dead in a shipwreck in the south of Gran Canaria while other immigrants wait to be helped

author: La Vanguardia
title: Ground News - 14 dead in a shipwreck in the south of Gran Canaria while other immigrants wait to be helped
text:
Summary by La Vanguardia A new shipwreck on the Canarian immigration route has killed 14 people in the last few hours in a zodiac that left the coast of Aaiún this morning with 68 people and is sinking about 55 kilometers from the Sahara and about 150 miles south of Gran Canaria, in international waters. At least seven women travel there, one nine-month pregnant and two babies. Keep reading... Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right

At least seven women travel there, one nine-month pregnant and two babies. Keep reading...
